Package helper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandResultHelper
    Helper to form and check answers to module or control interface commands.
    ConfigValue
    Represents a single configuration value used to exchange data beween modules, between a module and a control interface and to store configuration data in the database.
    DataContainerHeaderReader
    Reader for the binary data container format used within the system.
    DataContainerHeaderWriter
    Writer for the binary data container format used within the system.
    ModulePrioritySorter
    Sorts given modules to provide best start/stop order.
    ObjectValidator
    Contains static methods to check objects handled by the system.
    PersistentConfigurationHelper
    Helper to persist component configurations using ConfigValue as data elements in the database.
    ResourceHelper
    Helper to load resource files.
    TextFormatHelper
    Formats texts to be used internally or to visualize them to the user.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigValue.VALUE_TYPE
    The enum VALUE_TYPE.
